title.rendered: Staff Profile: Kevin Martinis, Account Manager Mid-Atlantic

content.rendered:
Kevin Martinis, Account Manager Mid-Atlantic

Phone: 617.804.6517
Connect on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kevin-martinis-722a09174 

“I specialize in building relationships with Biotechnology, Pharmaceutical, and Medical Device companies in the Mid-Atlantic including BioHealth Capital Region, Greater Philadelphia & New York New Jersey biotech clusters. I place entry level to senior level scientific candidates, working in both permanent (direct hire) recruiting and temporary (contract, contract to hire) staffing.”

ABOUT KEVIN

Graduate of the Northeastern University, Behavioral Neuroscience

What is the best thing about your job? The people that work at ClinLab are awesome. Great group of people who are driven and hard-working. The teamwork is outstanding, and everyone is also so great to hangout with outside of work. The company culture here is amazing!

What makes you good at your job? I am passionate about my work ethic and make sure I put in 100% every day. I am diligent, reliable, and extremely competitive.

What do you do for fun? Golf – too much. I also love enjoying time with my fiancé and our new Golden Retriever, Mulligan. It’s also football season, so every Sunday you can find me on the couch for multiple hours watching football!

 

.
